Test Name: SQUASH, Immunoglobulin E (IgE), and Serum Analysis
Purpose: To accurately measure SQUASH assay markers, total IgE, and routine serum biochemical parameters for diagnostic and monitoring purposes.
Container: Serum Separator Tube (SST) or red-top tube
Equipment: Centrifuge; micro-pipettes; incubators; automated analyzer for SQUASH and IgE assays; ELISA reader; biochemical analyzer
